data.name: AccountCreatedMsg
data.value:
Dear User,
Thank you for creating an account with the Rent Adjustment Program.
To electronically sign your petition or response form you must use the following 5 digit-pin number: PIN
This pin allows the City and RAP Staff to verify that you and only you have electronically signed a petition or a response with the Rent Adjustment Program. Please keep this pin number secure and do not share this pin number with anyone.
To reset your PIN please follow this link: LOGIN
If a third-party is filing a petition on your behalf you will receive a confirmation email asking you to sign the document with the pin.
If you feel you have received this email in error, or you did have not created an account. Please contact RAP Staff immediately at 510.238.3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: AppealMsg
data.value:
Dear Applicant,
Your appeal has been filed successfully. As a reminder, your Case Number is: CASEID
If you need to request translation services please do so here: LOGIN
RAP will evaluate your appeal and reach out with next steps. If your appeal required a hearing before the Rent Board someone from RAP staff will reach out regarding scheduling.
If you have any questions please contact RAP staff at Phone: (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: CityAccountCreatedMsg
data.value:
Dear User,
Thank you for creating an CIty account with the Rent Adjustment Program.
You can access your account here: LOGIN
If you feel you have received this email in error, or you did have not created an account. Please contact RAP Staff immediately at 510.238.3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: ForgotPasswordMsg
data.value:
Dear User,
You have requested the RAP resend your password to the RAP Online Petitioning system.
Your password is: PASSWORD
If you feel have received this message in error, please call RAP Staff immediately at (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: PetitionMsg
data.value:
Dear Applicant,
Your petition has been filed successfully. Your Case Number is: CASEID
If you need to request translation services please do through the user dashboard: LOGIN
Please continue to check your user dashboard for updates on your petition including your assigned hearing date, submitted response forms, and scheduling of hearing date. Additionally, all case information can be accessed and new information can be submitted through the user dashboards.
You have until 7 days before your hearing date to file to submit new evidence for your case.
If there is any information missing or if the City has any questions, a RAP staff person will reach out.
Below is a summary of your petition. Please keep this page for your records.
<Enter Summary of Petition>
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: ResendPinMsg
data.value:
Dear User,
You have requested the RAP resend your 5-Digit pin. Your pin is: PIN
This pin allows the City and RAP Staff to verify that you and only you have electronically signed a petition or a response with the Rent Adjustment Program. Please keep this pin number secure and do not share this pin number with anyone.
If you feel have received this message in error, please call RAP Staff immediately at (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: ResponseMsg
data.value:
Dear Applicant,
Your petition response has been filed successfully. Your Case Number is: CASEID
If you need to request translation services please do so here: LOGIN
Please continue to check your user dashboard for updates on this petition including your assigned hearing date, submitted case evidence, and scheduling of hearing date. Additionally, all case information can be accessed and new information can be submitted through the user dashboards.
You have until 7 days before your hearing date to file to submit new evidence for your case.
If there is any information missing or if the City has any questions, a RAP staff person will reach out.
If you have any questions please contact RAP staff at Phone: (510) 238-3721

data.name: String1
data.value:
"Dear <Name>,
The following changes have been made to your account:
<Enter in changes made>
If you feel have received this message in error, please call RAP Staff immediately at (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"
data.comment: Update account information (new password, notification settings)

data.name: String2
data.value:
"Dear <Name>,
The following Representative has been added/authorized to access your case, Case Number- <Enter Case Number>: [name] [email address] [phone number] (if available)
If you feel have received this message in error, please call RAP Staff immediately at (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"

data.name: String3
data.value:
Dear <Name>,
The following changes have been made to a representative in your case, Case Number <Enter Case Number>:
<Enter in changes made>
If you feel have received this message in error, please call RAP Staff immediately at (510) 238-3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland

data.name: String4
data.value:
"Dear <User>,
This email is to notify you that for case <Case Number>, the status of <Activity Name> has been changed from <Status 1> to <Status 2>. To see this change please access your account here: <link>
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"

data.name: String5
data.value:
"Dear <User>,
This email is to notify you that case <Case Number> has been changed from <Status 1> to <Status 2>. To see this change please access your account here: <link>
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"

data.name: String6
data.value:
"Dear <User>,
This email is to notify you that the following documents have been added to case <Case Number>:
<List of Attachments & Descriptions>
To access this case please go here: <Link to Online Portal>
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"

data.name: String7
data.value:
"Dear <Name>,
Thank you for creating an CIty account with the Rent Adjustment Program.
You can access your account here: <Link to Online Petition>
If you feel you have received this email in error, or you did have not created an account. Please contact RAP Staff immediately at 510.238.3721
Thank you,
The Rent Adjustment Program, The City of Oakland"""
